    • Method Detail

      • getDriverCoordinate

        public double getDriverCoordinate()
        Specified by:
        getDriverCoordinate in interface ControllerAxis
        Returns:
        The driver coordinate in driver units. This is the coordinate that was last sent to the controller. It may not yet reflect the physical machine position. Only after a MotionPlanner.waitForCompletion() can you be sure that the machine is in sync.

        public boolean coordinatesMatch​(Length coordinateA,
                                Length coordinateB)
        Specified by:
        coordinatesMatch in interface CoordinateAxis
        Returns:
        Whether the coordinates match in their native unit length and resolution as determined by the sub-class and possibly by a driver.
